mapper.select: SELECT bag.coupon_id AS coupon_id, COUNT( bag.coupon_id ) AS coupon_number, coupon.create_time, coupon.`name` AS title, coupon.discount, coupon.discounted_price, coupon.expired_time FROM us_coupon_user_bag AS bag, us_coupon AS coupon WHERE bag.create_user = #{userId} AND bag.coupon_id = coupon.id GROUP BY bag.coupon_id;

SELECT bag.coupon_id AS coupon_id, COUNT( bag.coupon_id ) AS coupon_number, coupon.create_time, coupon.`name` AS title, coupon.discount, coupon.discounted_price, coupon.expired_time FROM us_coupon_user_bag AS bag, us_coupon AS coupon WHERE bag.create_user = #{userId} AND bag.coupon_id = coupon.id AND coupon.expired_time >= coupon.create_time GROUP BY bag.coupon_id;
